hadiths.text: Narrated Salim bin `Abdullah:I heard my father saying, "Never did Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) assume Ihram except at the Mosque, that is, at the Mosque of Dhul-Hulaifa

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِهْلاَلِ عِنْدَ مَسْجِدِ ذِي الْحُلَيْفَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To recite talbiya and assume Ihram at the mosque of Dhul-Hulaifa
